effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Thunder Wave)
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
♂なら♀を　♀なら♂を　誘惑して
メロメロに　する。
相手は　技が　だしにくくなる。

If it is the opposite gender of the user,
the target becomes infatuated and less
likely to attack.

Se il nemico è del sesso opposto, s’infatua
e diventa riluttante ad attaccare.

Quien lo usa realiza un ataque rápido que
aumenta de potencia si el atacante no lleva
ningún objeto.

Gehört das Ziel dem anderen Geschlecht an,
verliebt es sich und greift eventuell nicht an.

Si l’ennemi est du sexe opposé, il tombe
amoureux et rechigne alors à attaquer.

수컷은 암컷을 암컷은 수컷을 유혹하여
헤롱헤롱하게 만든다.
상대가 기술을 쓰기 어려워진다.

♂なら♀を　♀なら♂を　ゆうわくして
メロメロにする。　メロメロに　なった
あいては　わざが　だしにくくなる。

If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.

user, the target becomes infatuated

tombe amoureux et rechigne alors
à attaquer.

If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the foe becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.

If it is the other
gender, the foe is
made infatuated and
unlikely to attack.

Makes it tough to
attack a foe of the
opposite gender.
